!Injured Soldier: The last thing I remember is jumping from a sinking airship. Then as I was about to be attacked by the monsters of the Seed, I blanked out. I can only remember bits and pieces of what happened, and it's all so terrifying. When I regained consciousness, I was here. I... don't want to be here anymore. No one should have to be here. I just want to see my family again. This is a hard request to make, but can you take me someplace safe? [Quest _454_CompletelyLost wounded_soldier_q454_02.htm|"Of course."]
